attributes.action: Force Local Councils to stop using spurious "improvements" to slow down traffic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Councils use any reason they can to slow down traffic flow and to inconvenience the motorist. Anything from deliberately siting bus stops at junctions through stupidly sited cycle lanes to badly-phased traffic lights. This is all done in the name of "public transport" and usually has a spurious "green" reason attached to it. This is just political dogma and does nothing to help our economy.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ScrapBusLanes/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
